lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help at some time, and I admire people that are hard-working entrepeneurs.

lender.name: Suzy
lender.loan_because: I volunteered in Africa and I know that there many hard working people with great ideas just waiting to put them to work.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children ages 9 to 11.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I won the birth jackpot being born in Canada!
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage trips to the poles: Antarctica and the Arctic.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a happy healthy life.

lender.name: Gabe
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: All-around musician

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in businesses that need money to grow larger and better and then I own part of the profits.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one. ~Mother Teresa

lender.name: Scott & Evelyn
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: A helping hand to get a business started or advanced is a worthwhile endeavor.
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.occupational_info: I write music.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It only takes a little bit to make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare lunches for school children.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids about what it's like to walk a mile in someone else's shoes to help them understand that there's a lot more in life than just their world.

lender.name: Shawn Coleman
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to work there way out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am missionary in Mexico. I am the director of academics at Calvary Chapel Bible College. We are training pastors and missionaries to go back home or out into the world and tell them about Jesus

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help someone else.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I like the Kiva philosophy. The world community needs us all to play a small part in a positive way, so I choose to do my bit when I'm in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: My work is about creating promotional material for other businesses, on time!

lender.name: Shafik
lender.loan_because: I experience, I care and I understand the feeling of those who run only a small entrepreneurship. Went to bank and experience how your loan application being rejected just because you did not possess a big company / did not have relationship with ............... just because you're a normal citizen
lender.occupational_info: I am just a servant of Allah

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work to keep money out of our corrupt governments coffers in the vain delusion that I can bankrupt the military and end this senseless war.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Roxanne
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: buffy
lender.loan_because:
I can.
I love travel and have had my life profoundly enriched by jaywalking into other worlds, and meeting people less fortunate than myself. Due to an awareness of my own good fortune and all the gifts I have been given via travel, I figure Kiva loans are the least I can do. It's not charity, it's just the same kind of helping hand we in the west receive on a regular basis.

lender.name: Callaway
lender.loan_because: Because I like Kiva because when my loan is refunded I get to help someone else with their business.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and am almost done with 1st grade. When I grow up I want to be a ninja. My brother Brooks and sister Cassidy, just helped me make my new loan. We want to help people.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: THE LOANS HELP PEOPLE TO START A BUSINESS SO THEY CAN HAVE A INCOME. MAYBE EMPLOY OTHER PEOPLE ALSO.
lender.occupational_info: I WORK IN A MAJOR DEPARTMENT STORE. ASSISTING CUSTOMERS IN THEIR CHOICES FOR CLOTHING .RINGING SALES OR FINDING GARMENTS IN OTHER CITIES FOR THEM.

lender.name: Mallory
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a helping hand!

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I CAN!!! and because i was introduced to KIVA by my sister and a great giftcard for my bday---

lender.name: Steve and Marjorie
lender.loan_because: Establishing small businesses leads to prosperity and economic independence. We are glad to offer a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Ensuring people get as much of what they've earned (private sector pension benefits) as possible (thorough a federal insurance program).

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women start and finance businesses.

lender.name: j peer
lender.loan_because: I was never able to borrow from a "bank" myself, and so it seems a good idea to help make an oppurtunity for others. I had family to help out in dire times, and as a Canadian, I have the security of our social safety nets. This micro-lending is neat...I hope it works out over the long run...and there continues to be no "religious" or "church" strings attached...
lender.occupational_info: Play loud organs and honky pianos...

lender.name: Michael & Danielle
lender.loan_because: May All be given the opportunity to work and fulfilment ... May All Be Happy...

lender.name: Kenneth Boh
lender.loan_because: It is only right to return back to the community.

lender.name: terre
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I believe that governments of all stripes ignore the little people of this world. Action at the grass roots is more effective than grand schemes. As a long-time typesetter I know that even the biggest picture is made up of thousands of tiny dots.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance copy editor and columnist for a prestigious Australian geographical magazine. I do freelance work for publishers, authors and printers. I am also a musician.

lender.name: LUI
lender.occupation: Starting to open a shop to help Philippinas
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by Clinton and Oprah and I have done donations all my life and I hope that more and more people participate in giving and make a change in the world, even a small change.
lender.occupational_info: I am planning to open a shop to help Philippinas in Hong Kong because they are a bit deprivated, I hope the shop helps some who work so hard just to get a home back in the Philippines, for their family or for themselves!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: For I mean not that other men be eased, and ye burdened; But by an equality, that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want, that their abundance also may be a supply for your want: that there may be equality; As it is written, he that had gathered much had nothing over; and he that had gathered little had no lack. (2 Corinthians 8:13-15)

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: one act of random kindness a day does make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: CEO/Founder of an Information Technology Solutions Group.

lender.name: Noraini
lender.loan_because: Giving makes me feel satisfied that I have helped other people, share God's blessing with others and improve people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: Responsibility of one human to another by giving in whatever means possible.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who have the courage to help themselves but only lack the finances ..I want to help someone achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: We provide accommodation services to college students .

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Family of Four
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our children about others in the world and to always appreciate how fortunate they are.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves to be able to work toward their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I make small handbags from home so that I can be a full-time mom and raise my children.

lender.name: Dusty
lender.loan_because: It's good and it works. Thanks kiva, great idea!

lender.name: priscilla
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability to do so
lender.occupational_info: when people have accident/dmges, either in their home or in a car i take the first report and put their minds at ease by going over their coverage with them to attempt to assist with the repairs

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: it feels good

lender.name: Indri
lender.loan_because: I'd love to be connected with people accross the world in positive ways. Giving (loans) to others is a great way to show gratitude for the countless blessings we now have.
lender.occupational_info: Leaving my full-time job to relocate to Thailand, I enjoy being a stay-home mum, learning domestic skills and having options of social activities & works to get involved in.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to give a helping hand to someone in need.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want everyone to be able to have a good quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am out of work. I was laid off the end of May.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of international education--helping to build educational programs overseas. Being part of Kiva is a great experience & is a personal way that we can all give a hand to others who may need it.

lender.name: Willy
lender.loan_because:
I was hit so hard by Oprah's show at 11 January 2008 on the Hallmark Channel. I was told there's a Kiva.
I think it's our responsibility to help those who need a help. We have been truly blessed in our lives and we are happy to give something back.
Well i am just a person who trying to help people here even though it's just only a little money. I believe it does help.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in a small advertising company named Pomato Asia in Jakarta, Indonesia Country. I work with my 2 bosses and 3 friends. They are as like as my family. They love us, they care, they make us laugh so hilarious, they teach how to make a good design, and so many other things.
Hopefully it does impact you

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: My Mother gave me a Kiva loan for christmas and it was one of my favorite presents. I love the idea of helping people establish their own businesses. Instead of just handing them their dream, it gives them the tools to achieve it on their own, which I believe is much more special.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Anthropologist

lender.name: Ed Terry
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have a steady job and loving family. It's only fair that I share these blessings as best I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work to fund female-led enterprises. I think it is important to support these endeavors as they are positive role models in their communities and helps to remove gender stigmas and prejudices. I hope my efforts help.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can and I should. I have been helped in my life and I need to return the help.
lender.occupational_info: I represent child.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: People have blessed me, now it's time for me to pay it forward.

lender.name: Arif
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea to help people help themselves. If everyone helped a little the result would be amazing!

lender.name: Lopez Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and would like to share those blessings with others. We want to show our children that everyone can make a difference.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I just want to try and help people in much harder environments than I have ever had to experience, when they are showing intitiative to improve the lives of themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I manage an I.T. operation throughout Asia

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to help! With such a small amount of money you know you are making a big difference in someones life!
lender.occupational_info: Well, right now I'm a student at Webster University in Geneva where I'm studying International Relations. Next school year I will be doing study abroad programs to study in the Netherlands and Thailand. I am foreseen to graduate in May 2012.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: my life is good and I want to help others have a better life:-)

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
It builds value and trust for those involved. Its an ideal way to help others achieve results that make a difference.
I have also travelled extensively in Africa and know first hand the conditions that many people live in. I know that via Kiva this is the best way for me to contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I have a website business and also an importing company.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to have grown up not having to want for anything. I'd like to help others, especially women, achieve their goals.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It is so easy and feels so good to do something for people who can then help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital caring for people who have cancers of the blood or lymph system. We specialize in bone marrow and stem cell transplants.

lender.name: Capt Denny
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I catch fish.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: They have greater needs than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the workforce but enjoy helping people.

lender.name: NDSS/Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans are an important solution to the development of emerging economies.
lender.occupational_info: Law and Math teacher

lender.name: Ralf
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Everybody, who have the Possibility to help, should help.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place :)
lender.occupational_info: I care for sick people in the hospital.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have been the beneficiary of much love and support as I transformed my dream into reality. My journey has been helped by the clients I now see who pay for my services, and I would like to honour their contributions by offering financial support to other women who are transforming not only their lives but those of their families...
lender.occupational_info: I work with women who want to transform their lives, just like you are. Women who want to make a difference to their own lives. I teach them how to stop being fearful, enjoy being the amazing women they are, and to hold their heads up high in this world.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping others in need is not just the right thing to do but gives you some form of accomplishment no matter how little or big it is, the thought and desire to help, if we can, we should do :)
lender.occupational_info: Im a stay at home single parent of 2 boys.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed in my life and would like to give something back to those, who struggle to have a good existence. By lending, I hope to give someone the opportunity to start or continue something, he or she can be proud of.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university in Egypt, which is still under establishment. My team is responsible of finding partner universities and companies around the world in order to be able to offer exchange programmes, joint research and internship opportunities as well as dual degrees for all of our students.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We should help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a policeman. I'm sure it's the same in most places around the world.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: This is a small thing that I can do that comes with great personal rewards. God has seen me thru many troubles and trials, and never once failed me - he has picked me up and dusted me off many times - and for his forgiveness-mercy-love and kindness - I fill moved to give to help others - that they may find Christ and his light thru their journey on this earth - and maybe - just maybe by making this loan helped played a part in it all..
lender.occupational_info: debug computer problems

lender.name: kenneth
lender.loan_because: I can help

lender.name: Jeffery Bridges
lender.occupation: Night Auditor in Yosemite National Park, CA
lender.loan_because: this is way better than just giving people $, services or goods. And this feels good to be a part of something greater than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I do the paperwork in the Ahwahnee Hotel in Yosemite National Park -- I am also there in case any guests needs assistance -- I also try to keep any bears, raccoons, ringtail cats & skunks out of the hotel -- and deal with any other adventures that come my way

lender.name: Summer
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work in the marketing department of a children's nonfiction book publisher.

lender.name: con
lender.loan_because: I can and should.
lender.occupational_info: social entrepreneur/community artist/educator

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in peoples lives.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help
lender.occupational_info: I counsel children placed in homes away from their biological families

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It is something we all should do. Perhaps in this small way, I will make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed in the energy business. My line of work involves drilling oil and gas wells as well as alternative energy projects such as wind generation.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I saw this site on NBC News and have wanted to get involved with this in other parts of the world besides the Pacific.
lender.occupational_info: I am an American University Doctoral student who works in the Pacific with HIV/AIDS prevention and treatment.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: What a great way to improve the world! Together, thousands of little ants can roll a large stone.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am at a university learning the fundamentals of Chinese medicine. I also work as an intern in a clinic using herbs and acupuncture needles to bring relief to my patients. Chinese medicine can be used to treat chronic pain, digestive diseases, menstrual disorders and many other conditions.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves makes for a more civil world.

lender.name: Martine
lender.loan_because: Unique way to help women entrepreneurs improve their lives

lender.name: felden1
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I am fascinated by what we can do together. No one person can do it alone, but together, we can make a difference.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: People only need to be given the opportunity to help themselves.

lender.name: Sara Rose
lender.loan_because: Random Acts of Kindness make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Place advertisements in local media and coordinate marketing/promotional events.

lender.name: gin-online-kaufen
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microcredits. Kiva makes it easy for everybody to be a part of it. That¬¥s great.
lender.occupational_info: helping enterprises to earn even more money by using it systems...

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Give others a chance for a better life
lender.occupational_info: The majority of my working years was spent managing and recruiting professionals in buiness.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate for my life, and I would like to help others achieve a similar path!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems that support financial transactions and reporting.

lender.name: Abbey and Mitchell
lender.loan_because: We hope to help someone fulfill their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: We help people travel across the states to see loved ones.

lender.name: Mabel
lender.loan_because: there is always room for improvement!

lender.name: Ted and Gaye
lender.occupation: Gaye is a retired lawyer, Ted died last year.
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate beyond belief and we are honored to help others.
lender.occupational_info: That we help is more important than what we earn our money at. We are hopeful optimists.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Life is more fun when you can help someone else enjoy the ride

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: It is an honor to be a small part of supporting those who are working so hard to make a better life.

lender.name: Georgia Friend
lender.loan_because: "I wondered why 'Somebody' didn't do something. Then I realized, I am 'Somebody.'"--Unknown

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupation: Stay at home mom/ski instructor/ CTRS

lender.name: jim s.
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money can make a big impact.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and improve old houses.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams across the world and make a change for better.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites and software applications!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupation: mother-- former environmental engineer, MBA alum

lender.name: Rob and Amanda
lender.loan_because: Kiva send our money directly to the people who have the inspiration and ideas to improve their lives. We need to share the advantages that we've been given.
lender.occupational_info: Rob teaches science at high school, and Amanda works with companies to improve their environmental, social approaches.

lender.name: Alfredo Llaquet Alsina
lender.loan_because: I can and I believe it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a small software developing company, with three other associates.

lender.name: AI Software, Inc.
lender.loan_because: We want to help others achieve their goals and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are a custom software application company who focuses on companies and individuals with needs that don't exist in "off the shelf" software.

lender.name: Eamon & Patricia
lender.loan_because: we all need someone to believe in us!
lender.occupational_info: Fulfilling, working for yourself gives you satisfaction knowing at the end of the day it is you and your abilities that will make you or break you.

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I want to help women live their best life and do the same for their children.
lender.occupational_info: Jewelry Designer and builder

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It glorifies God!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We all have families that we love and want to support.

lender.name: Jane and Allen
lender.occupation: Museum educator and tree service expert

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of KIVA! You know what is happening with the money and that it is doing something to help a real person, family and community.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Letitia and John
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a decent life
lender.occupational_info: I consult with people about their health concerns and then make suggestions about herbs, supplements and foods they can add to improve their health.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: We here at CCD decided to help people who are in different parts of the world that want to make a better life for themselves and their families..We want to support this dream..
lender.occupational_info: We do weddings, golf outing and tons of other parties here at a private country club in Connecticut. We make dreams come true for each person having an event as it is special to each and every one of them and we want to make it happen.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: I love to help others who are in need, and who have the courage to ask for it. I enjoy supporting people to achieve more of what they want in life. I, especially, am touched by hard working, strong women who are motivated by the love of their children. I loan because it feels good to do something thats makes a difference, and has a huge impact on and within all of us. :)
lender.occupational_info: My work supports people who have varying degrees of mental illness, and just need some direction/help to live happier, independent lives. I, also, have a website to promote overall health and well-being.

lender.name: Daedalus Systems
lender.loan_because: Daedalus Systems is a brand new small business dedicated to social responsibility from the start. We donate a portion of every high performance system built to Kiva borrowers and allow our buyers the choice to match that donation.
lender.occupational_info: We build and service extreme high performance computers.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I can, and others can't.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the video game industry.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to directly assist people around the world who want to improve their lives and educate their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes and delivers fresh fruit juice.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do with my money--rather than buy another CD or a dinner, I'd rather loan it to someone who needs it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I correct the language of professional reports that go to our government to help approve drugs for people with different health problems.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way for me to help someone in need and to hopefully help someone make a change in their life.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.occupational_info: I'm a non-instructional clerk with our local school district. We assist staff with the computer programs for students and staff in our district.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: It is one way to help create world peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from helping children in schools with severe impairments, but not from helping.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because:
I share because I am fortunate to have been born -- by chance -- into the circumstances that I was. We're all part of the same human family, and we can and should give each other a hand.
"May we see that we could have been born as each other." ~ Vickram Seth, in "Two Lives: a Memoir"
Remember to be Thankful...
If you woke up this morning with more health than illness, you are more blessed than the million who will not survive this week.
If you have never experienced the danger of battle, the loneliness of imprisonment, the agony of torture, or the pangs of starvation, you are ahead of five hundred million people in the world.
If you can attend a church meeting without fear of harassment, arrest, torture, or death, you are more blessed than three billion people in the world.
If you have food in the refrigerator, clothes on your back, a roof overhead and a place to sleep, you are richer than 75% of this world.
If you have money in the bank, in your wallet, and spare change in a dish some place, you are among the top 8% of the world‚Äôs wealthy.
If you hold up your head with a smile on your face and are truly thankful, you are blessed because the majority can, but most do not.
If you can hold someone‚Äôs hand, hug them, or even touch them on the shoulder, you are blessed because you can offer healing touch.
If you can read this you are more blessed than over two billion people in the world that cannot read at all.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe like Nobel Peace laureate Professor Muhammad Yunus that we can help create a world without poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am the captain of the Kiva team at the company where I work. I tell my friends and co-workers about microfinance and how we might create a world without poverty. I work to make the Internet a safe place for everyone.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: it's time to give back. I want to help.

lender.name: Aurelia
lender.loan_because: i recived some credit as a present from my dad and i think that is the best way for people who need to inverst to get money whithout getting stuck in a real heavy credit process.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my winters in the snow in the swiss alps and my summer trying to make a little bit of money to spend the next winter in the snow, and so on... plus i live in a poscard...isn't it?

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: I defend the constitution of the United States by defending people accused of committing crimes. I fight to protect their rights and ensure that they get a fair trail. I am an advocate for people in the justice system.

lender.name: Shanan
lender.loan_because: I've been given many chances in life and it feels good to now give someone else a chance.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe in the need for building community and offering hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are dying to support them, their families and whatever their end-of-life goals are.

lender.name: Moyra Turkington
lender.loan_because:
Helping people help themselves is one of the most amazing things that a person can do. My husband Brand and I lived in India a few years back and saw first hand the kind of impact that micro-loans could have to support the industriousness of people who are striving to improve their businesses families and communities.
I admire the way that micro-finance institutions demonstrate a powerful capacity to change the opportunities and standing of women in developing countries. The peer to peer micro-lending model that Kiva has developed is a phenomenal way to have a direct impact on the lives of people that need a hand up.
lender.occupational_info:
Moyra works for Bell Canada. She leads a team that develops a suite of tools and systems that help the company test and repair the telephone and internet lines.
Brand is the Head of Corporate Communications at a mid sized IT firm in Toronto.

lender.name: Wealth Junkie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve the dream of starting their own business.

lender.name: Tracy

lender.loan_because: We should do what we can to help one another.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: the Kiva idea resonates deeply within me -- the chance for one person to help another person half a world away, directly and concretely.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small bakery, a happy place filled with good people and good music, and bake about 200 loaves of bread each day.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It selfishly feels good. I'd like to think I'm making a difference (if only to a few).
lender.occupational_info: I provide investment and retirement planning services. I have the opportunity to meet and work with many people from a diversity of backgrounds. I have three sons that play a lot of hockey.

lender.name: Andr√©
lender.loan_because: They make very good use of what they borrow, Kiva‚Äôs business model (i.e. trustworthy facilitation of micro finance) works well and anyone who can lend a little money is lucky and privileged to be a part of this!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an IT advisor, working for Aker Solutions, a Norwegian oil services company.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Sharing whatever wealth each of us has is a vital component to maintaining the strength of the human fabric of our global community.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant in the natural products industry supporting high quality and sustainability. I also work to spread the word about the best companies and their products and will soon have an extensive database with information about these companies and their products available on the internet. I also own a natural products distribution company.

lender.occupational_info: I work with leaders in businesses to help them achieve greater success by working more effectively with their people.

lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful opportunity to get involved in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an educational not-for-profit company in NH. We develop educational tools that help schools improve teaching and learning. I have just completed a master's program in education.

lender.name: Lorraine

lender.occupational_info: Help those who are suffering from addictions to find hope and serenity through sobriety and recovery.

lender.occupational_info: I work in a pediatric teaching hospital guiding children and their families towards physical and emotional health. I also educate new nurses at a Christian university in Seattle.

lender.occupational_info: I am a restaurant. I am located in one of the best places on earth - Newport Beach, California. The beach is at my front door. We have a great time every day. It is like throwing a party and everyone is invited.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: It provides choice and everyone deserves choice.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time university student studying Latin American culture and language and Global Development. I also work as an accounting assistant for a non-profit organization that works in land ownership and community building in Latin America.

lender.occupational_info: I am a doula, or a birthing assistant. In my spare time I take pictures of people and make them look pretty.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info:
In 1961, President John F. Kennedy established the Peace Corps to promote world peace and friendship.
The Peace Corps' mission has three simple goals:
1) Helping the people of interested countries in meeting their need for trained men and women. 2) Helping promote a better understanding of Americans on the part of the peoples served. 3) Helping promote a better understanding of other peoples on the part of Americans.
